word_mean: 芳香剂:在有机化学中,指含环系的化合物,由结合双键的闭环或非键的电子对促进稳定。例如苯和萘

sentence.Network_cn: 芳香胶囊对缓解鼻塞有奇效。

sentence.Network_en: It has an agreeable aromatic smell.
An aromatic beef stew waited on the stove.
sentence.Network_cn: 炉子上放着香味四溢的炖牛肉。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : via Old French from late Latin aromaticus, from Greek arōmatikos, from arōma (see aroma)

entry.tran: （植物或食品）有香味的，芳香的
entry.def: An aromatic plant or food has a strong, pleasant smell of herbs or spices.

example.ex: ...an evergreen shrub with deep green, aromatic leaves...
example.tran: 叶子呈深绿色且带芳香气息的常青灌木丛

example.ex: An aromatic beef stew waited on the stove.
example.tran: 炉子上放着香味四溢的炖牛肉。

means.word_mean: 1. (chemistry) of or relating to or containing one or more benzene rings;

sentences.sentence: "the pine woods were more redolent"- Jean Stafford

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"人或科学"; 2. 表形容词,通常放在名词后,表示"与……相关的,……的"; 3. 表名词,"某种药或医学有关"

stems_affixes.word_buile: lunate月+ic人或科学→lunatic月亮的圆缺引起精神病等

charisma超凡魅力,感召力+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.有魅力的
